channel.title: Play The Field
channel.description: Play The Field is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated, tune in!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, and Liam Spellman
